name: cjs-module-lexer
description: Lexes CommonJS modules, returning their named exports metadata

scripts.test: npm run test-wasm && npm run test-js
scripts.build: node build.js && babel dist/lexer.mjs | terser -o dist/lexer.js
scripts.footprint: npm run build && cat dist/lexer.js | gzip -9f | wc -c
